data.message: I think some of those people that are being bigots and discriminating gays, shouldn't be on Facebook if they have a problem with this post. Love is love no matter what, it's the 21st bloody century, god!

replies.message: Homosexuality is a choice made by people that goes against a holy and just God. Live your life your way, but you shouldn't be throwing it in the faces of people of faith.
So why they are organasing these demonstrations? Sit quietly and enjoy your "love"

Dwayne was your hetrosexuality a choice? Do yourself two favours: 1) have empathy for others - put yourself in the shoes of others and 2) do your research - hetrosexuality & homosexuality gene differences have been found.
Actually, being hetrosexual is a choice, it's a choice many people "should" be making, and aren't.
u pigs  u should be ashamed of what u r allowing
